name: granny stitch drink tote
sizes_available: one size: 10" around x 11.5" tall (without handle)
notes:
> join my facebook group for community,
> coupons, and cal challenges:
> 
> [take me to the group!][1]

yarn
peaches & creme stripey, medium #4 (100% cotton; 102 yds/93 m per 2 oz/56.7 g skein): color a flannel, 1 skein

tools 
us size g/6 (4.00mm) crochet hook
stitch markers

finished sizes
5” flat (10” around) x 11.5” tall (without handles)

stitch key
ch(s) = chain(s) 
sc = single crochet 
dc = double crochet
st(s) = stitch(es) 
sl st = slip stitch

pattern notes
pattern is worked from the bottom up in one solid piece.
use a st marker to mark the top of the first st in each new round.


  [1]: https://www.facebook.com/groups/groupsalenabacacrochet/
